articles.author: Dale Drinkwater
articles.title: Foxtel Australia launches review into Christian TV channel with anti-vax message - ABC News
articles.description: Foxtel says its is reviewing the content in one of its American Christian TV channels that broadcasts anti-vaccination messages, after it received complaints from Australian viewers.
articles.content:
Foxtel Australia has launched a review into one of its offerings, an American Christian television channel, that has been accused of broadcasting COVID-19 disinformation.

articles.title: Donald Trump drops off Forbes' 400 richest Americans - Daily Trust
articles.description: A former U.S. President, Donald Trump, was not included in the annual Forbes 400 ranking of the wealthiest Americans.
articles.content:
A former U.S. President, Donald Trump, was not included in the annual Forbes 400 ranking of the wealthiest Americans.
